steps.title: Schedule Pickup
steps.content: Now book a quality repair service from the convenience of your home. No travelling time, no waiting in queues.

steps.title: Diagnosis & Estimation
steps.content: Get the correct diagnosis and price quotation through our technology enabled platform over email and sms

steps.title: Repair upon Approval
